name: ingenidev, Code Widget for Elementor
author: ingenidev

sections.description:
ingenidev, Code Widget for Elementor adds a Widget to your Elementor menu providing a drag and drop, easy to use code snippet that automatically formats the contents as code and allows the page viewer to easily copy the code contents to his clipboard for ease of use.

Privacy notices

This plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users
  • write any user personal data to the database
  • send any data to external servers
  • make use of cookies

Our plugins

The following plugins are recommended by ingenidev :

  • AED Symbol Changer for Woocommerce By default, WooCommerce uses the currency symbol for the United Arab Emirates Dirham (AED) as “د.إ”. This plugin changes it to “AED “.
  • Cash on Delivery Shield a plugin that allows you to disable Cash on Delivery payment method for orders made by users who are not logged in.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Code Widget for Elementor? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Website
  2. Plugin Page
  3. Support

short_description: This Elementor plugin allows you to display and format a code container that includes for the viewer an easy to use copy to clipboard functionality.
